mapper.select: SELECT T1.FILE_IDX , T1.TRANSACTION_IDX , T1.FILE_NAME , CONCAT( (SELECT PATH FROM PATH WHERE PATH_NAME='FILE_ROOT') , "\\" , T3.COMPANY_NAME , "[" , T3.COMPANY_IDX , "]\\" , T1.FILE_PATH) AS FILE_PATH , T1.FILE_TYPE FROM FILE T1 JOIN TRANSACTION T2 ON T1.TRANSACTION_IDX = T2.TRANSACTION_IDX JOIN COMPANY T3 ON T2.COMPANY_IDX = T3.COMPANY_IDX WHERE T1.FILE_IDX = #{value}
